transcript:
[Ringing]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Haan sir, good afternoon, 4:00 baje tak chalao, 3:00 baje mat chalao. Okay.
Customer: Aur main bank mein, bank mein call karta hu.
Executive: To 3:00 baje aap bol rahe ho na connect karne ke liye sir. Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Request to run until 4:00, not 3:00.

- Customer will call the bank.



Resolution:

- Acknowledged the request to connect at 3:00.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

bank, time
